1370: Eremboldus moved to Die lange straet2.A.4 after marriage.
Got married to Imma at age 20 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Imma, Amalburga, at age 20.
1371: Had a son with Imma, Bernero, at age 21.
1372: Had a daughter with Imma, Folqui, at age 22.
1375: Had a daughter with Imma, Soeten, at age 25.
Lost daughter Soeten when Soeten was 1 years old.
1379: Lost son Coppesoeten when Coppesoeten was 0 years old.
Lost his wife Imma and their son Coppesoeten  while Imma was giving birth when he was 29.
Became caretaker of Amalburga, Bernero, Folqui at age 30.
